string:
Wash for at least 1 hour prior to immunoprobing.


Immunoprobing:


Immunoprobing, fluorescence imaging (on a Genepix Microarray scanner) and quantitation are all performed as previously described2.


Analysis software can be downloaded here (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.5091209)
refer: as previously described refers to the methods and procedures for immunoprobing, fluorescence imaging, and quantitation that have been mentioned or explained before.
